53.4 % and 90.0 % accuracies.on: fine - grained and binary sentiment classification tasks

achieves.from sentence: In particular , CNN - RNF - LSTM achieves 53.4 % and 90.0 % accuracies on the fine - grained and binary sentiment classification tasks respectively , which match the state - of the - art results on the Stanford Sentiment Treebank .

obtains.from sentence: CNN - RNF - LSTM also obtains competitive results on answer sentence selection datasets , despite the simple model architecture compared to state - of - the - art systems .

Conventional RNN models.from sentence: Conventional RNN models clearly benefit from max pooling , especially on the task of answer sentence selection .

RNF - based CNN models.from sentence: As a result , RNF - based CNN models perform consistently better than max - pooled RNN models .
